  • Classes in com.ikalagaming.event used by com.ikalagaming.core.events 
    Class and Description

    An abstract event to be extended.
  • Classes in com.ikalagaming.event used by com.ikalagaming.event 
    Class and Description
    Event
    An abstract event to be extended.
    EventException
    Fired when something went wrong in the event system.
    EventExecutor
    An interface for executing events.
    EventListener
    A listener that handles events.
    EventManager
    Manages events and listeners.
    HandlerList
    Stores handlers per event.
    Listener
    An interface used by Listeners.
  • Classes in com.ikalagaming.event used by com.ikalagaming.gui

    An annotation to mark methods as being event handler methods.
